A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The special effects were great. I loved some of Yodas lines. However admiral Holdo wss a horribly done character. The events and plot were almost to the point of idiotic. Rey just knows everything\, no weaknesses. Leia can wake up in space and fly. No one gets affected by vacuum of space when they pull her in. The whole guilt tripped casino planet scene was downright needless. Luke is next to meaningless. It all seems like someone's silly dream. It's definitely not a Star Wars movie.
